title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.7 - Security safeguards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.7 - Security safeguards

State Regulations
(a) Hardware installations, remote terminals and physical files shall be maintained
in secured areas. (b) Direct access
to CYIMIS data through electronic means shall require the use of a user
code. (c) Audit trails shall be
performed to document all data entry and inquiry activity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8203.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
